thread.title: Kylie Minogue’s ‘gold-digger’ ex-fiancé Joshua Sasse was never trusted by her friends and family, including sister Dannii
thread.title_full: Kylie Minogue’s ‘gold-digger’ ex-fiancé Joshua Sasse was never trusted by her friends and family, including sister Dannii

author: ttowers
title: Kylie Minogue’s ‘gold-digger’ ex-fiancé Joshua Sasse was never trusted by her friends and family, including sister Dannii
text:
15 Friends believe Sasse was using the Aussie pop princess to enhance his own fame 
“We believe it all came down to a desperate attempt for stardom. He made sure to attend events on her arm — from the Brits to the Absolutely Fabulous premiere — and appear with her on TV and stage at every opportunity. 
“None of Kylie’s previous partners have ever shown such a keen interest in sharing her spotlight and people saw through it.” 
Younger sister Dannii, 45, was particularly wary, according to Minogue insiders. 
A source said: “She spent some time with Joshua and Kylie around Christmas 2015 and has hardly spoken of him since and never followed him on any social media.” Fame Flynet However, Kylie ignored words of warning from those closest to her Kylie Minogue kisses her boyfriend in new video 
Kylie took Joshua into her £10million West London townhouse and paid for no-expense-spared holidays, including over Christmas at a rented castle in Ballater, Scotland, where she was spotted by locals. 
An insider said: “Joshua didn’t have a fixed abode so until last week he was living with Kylie. RELATED STORIES kylie's hatache Last pictures of Kylie - wearing two hats - and fiance Joshua together show the pop star looking glum HE SHOULD BE SO LUCKY What on earth was Joshua Sasse thinking? Kylie Minogue’s sexiest moments show he was a fool to cheat What kind of fool? Get the low-down on Joshua Sasse, British actor and now Kylie Minogue’s FORMER fiancé KILLER WOMAN Meet Marta Milans, the Spanish actress at the centre of Kylie Minogue's split from fiancé Joshua Sasse 'WE'VE DECIDED TO GO OUR SEPARATE WAYS' Kylie thanks fans for their support after dumping toyboy 'cheat' Joshua Sasse 'We wish only the best for each other' Kylie Minogue confirms split from Joshua Sasse and thanks fans for their 'support' 
“He had a great life. Everyone’s pretty certain she sorted out a hair transplant for him because he had become paranoid about losing his hair.” 
Joshua has since moved back in with his parents in Leominster, Herefordshire. There was also serious concern about the actor’s high profile bids to gain attention. 
That included last February when he pledged to run the London ­Marathon to celebrate a decade of Kylie being free of cancer . Getty Images Joshua has since moved back in with his parents in Leominster, Herefordshire Getty Images - WireImage 15 He enjoyed a raft of publicity during his relationship with Kylie 
He tweeted: “So Proud to say on Kylie’s 10yr ‘All Clear’ I’m running the London Marathon for @BCCare any support means the world!” 
But just nine days before the marathon Joshua pulled out, claiming he had not been able to train due to a “crazy work schedule”. 
A friend said: “It felt like this was all about getting more column inches for himself. And what happened to the £1,800 he raised?” 
She’s always wanted to marry - it’s so unfair 
Pals are even more outraged by Joshua’s bid to turn his wedding to Kylie into a political hot potato in her homeland through the Say I Do Down Under campaign. 
He persuaded the adoring I Should Be So Lucky singer to agree that they would not tie the knot until gay marriage became legal in Australia . Getty Images Sister Dannii refused to join his campaign for gay marriage, despite being involved in gay rights PA:Press Association 15 She also 'rarely spoke of Kylie's fiance and never followed him on social media' 
Joshua enjoyed a raft of publicity, including appearances on BBC News, Aussie TV and an onstage appearance at the ARIA Awards. 
Dannii mysteriously refused to support the campaign, despite being a major supporter of gay issues. 
She said: “I’m doing my own thing and have done for ever. No one can take that away from me.” 
A friend said: “All Kylie has ever wanted is to settle down and get married. This was such an unfair thing because there’s no guarantee gay marriage will be legalised in Australia any time soon.” 
And Kylie’s inner circle remain enraged that Joshua claimed he was unaware of her stardom, de­spite growing up in the UK at the height of her fame in the Nineties. Getty Images Those closest to Kylie are hoping she will find love again soon Getty Images 15 Especially as she has just signed a new record deal with BMG 
In a much-derided interview, he said: “I’m not really a fan of popular culture so frankly, I just, I really didn’t know who she was.” 
Meanwhile, Joshua’s career has faltered with two flop US TV shows Galavant — where he met Kylie on set — and No Tomorrow, where is thought to have had a relationship with co-star Marta. 
Those closest to Kylie are hopeful that despite her heartbreak she will find love again soon — especially as she has just signed a new record deal with BMG. 
Everyone is just stunned that Joshua would be so stupid 
A pal said: “She’s one of the world’s most beautiful women and an international superstar. Everyone is just stunned that Joshua would be so stupid. 
“With a major new record deal just signed and a brand new album to come this year, they can be sure she’ll be back on top in no time. 
“He’ll find it a lot harder to bounce back.”
